history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rsqr_lt_abs_0. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rsqr_lt_abs_0,triangle_rectangle_lt. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rsqr_lt_abs_0,triangle_rectangle_lt. srun best use: Rplus_lt_reg_l.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y : R, x² < y² -> Rabs x < Rabs y" on hypothesis of type "x + y < x + z".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y z : R, x² + y² < z² -> Rabs x < Rabs z /\\ Rabs y < Rabs z" on hypothesis of type "x + y < x + z".

original: intros. intros H. apply Rsqr_lt_abs_0 in H. apply triangle_rectangle_lt in H. destruct H. auto.
